sentences.english: Institution of the official teachers is the important part of the official education.
sentences.chinese: 官师制度是官学教育的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Along with the official education, the private developed as well.
sentences.chinese: 在官学的带动下，私学教育也获得了长足发展。

definition: Imperial College of Supreme Learning, established in 124 BC, and the highest educational institute in ancient China until the Sui Dynasty
Imperial College (or Academy), the highest educational body in imperial China
scholar preparing for imperial examinations (in former times)
sinology/Chinese studies (in foreign schools)/Han Learning, a Qing dynasty movement aiming at a philological appraisal of the Classics
Imperial Hanlin Academy, lasting from Tang dynasty until 1911
the first modern Chinese library established in 1898 by William A.P. Martin 丁韙良|丁韪良, becoming the foundation for Peking University library
central of the five Zhou dynasty royal academies
